m_szDocSumamry: Home / Business / Cemont, a brand owned by Air Liquide Welding Cemont, a brand owned by Air Liquide Welding Posted on Cemont > About Cemont > The brand Cemont, a brand owned by Air Liquide Welding Cemont is a brand of high repute in the field of welding products and battery chargers that designs, manufactures and commercialises all over the world its own products. Thanks to technological leadership and high quality standards, the enterprise can fully satisfy clients' expectations.
